title: Market Capitalization and Valuation Metrics of Molina Healthcare Inc

content.text: As of the latest available data, Molina Healthcare Inc has a market capitalization of $9.6 billion. This puts the company in the mid-cap range within the healthcare industry.

Examining the valuation metrics of Molina Healthcare Inc reveals the following: 
1. Price-to-Earnings (P/E) Ratio: The P/E ratio for Molina Healthcare Inc is 16.81, indicating that investors are willing to pay $16.81 for every dollar of earnings generated by the company. This ratio is within the industry average.
2. Price-to-Sales (P/S) Ratio: The P/S ratio for Molina Healthcare Inc is 0.41, suggesting that investors are valuing the company at 0.41 times its annual sales. This ratio is lower than the industry average.
3. Price-to-Book (P/B) Ratio: The P/B ratio for Molina Healthcare Inc is 2.98, indicating that investors are valuing the company at 2.98 times its book value. This ratio is higher than the industry average.

When compared to industry benchmarks, Molina Healthcare Inc has a market capitalization within the mid-cap range. The company's P/E ratio is in line with the industry average, while the P/S ratio is lower and the P/B ratio is higher than the industry average. These valuation metrics suggest that Molina Healthcare Inc may be undervalued relative to its sales but overvalued relative to its book value.
